body_html:
similar problem as described at top but with later software:
nvidia driver 390.12
cuda release 9.1, V9.1.85
cudnn v7.1.4
pytorch 0.5.0a0+01f5b )build from source because the nvidia geforce 940M is not supported anymore in the latest build)

also, the test_cuda.py in pytorch core dumps after printing out many lines of periods and s's.
Is there some compile option for pytorch that I need to set?

body:
similar problem as described at top but with later software:
nvidia driver 390.12
cuda release 9.1, V9.1.85
cudnn v7.1.4 
pytorch 0.5.0a0+01f5b )build from source because the nvidia geforce 940M  is not supported anymore in the latest build)

also, the test_cuda.py in pytorch core dumps after printing out many lines of periods and s's.
Is there some compile option for pytorch that I need to set?
